headline: Merck No Longer In Talks With Revolution Medicines: WSJ
summary: FEATURE  Merck is no longer in discussions to buy biotech Revolution Medicines, according to people familiar with the matter.  Merck had recently been in talks to acquire RevMed in a deal that could have valued the cancer-drug biotech at around $30 billion.

headline: Merck No Longer in Talks to Buy Revolution Medicines
summary: The drugmaker had recently been in discussions to acquire RevMed in a deal that could have valued the cancer-drug biotech at around $30 billion.

headline: Merck & Co., Inc. (MRK) and CEPI Launch Effort to Make Ebola Vaccine Cheaper and Easier to Distribute

(NYSE:MRK)’s MSD unit and the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) said on January 21 that they are launching a $30 million program to create an updated version of Merck’s Ebola vaccine. headline: Here Are the Top Four Blue-Chip Stocks To Buy in 2026, According to WarrenAI
summary: Investing.com -- Blue chip stocks in the healthcare sector are showing exceptional growth potential according to recent rankings from WarrenAI. The analysis highlights four standout companies that combine strong fundamentals with significant upside potential, making them attractive options in today’s market.
